content: ffrreeee ppaatttteerrnn ig demiwool ig demiwool ig demiwool material abbreviations 1 yarn any sport or dk r round light weight yarn i used magic_ring magic_ring yarnart jeans chain chain 2 hook size 2 0 - 2 5mm single_crochet single_crochet 3 6mm eyes increase increase 4 fiberfill decrease decrease 5 stitch markers slip_stitch slip_stitch 6 yarn needle scissors color size if you use yarn as duck yellow orange me the finished duck will hat pink blue be 8 5cm / 3 35in tall ig demiwool head use yellow yarn r1 magic_ring 6sc 6 r2 6 increase 12 r3 1sc increase x 6 18 r4 1sc increase 1sc x 6 24 r5 3sc increase x 6 30 r6 2sc increase 2sc x 6 36 r7 10 4 rounds 36 single_crochet 36 r11 11sc 4inc 6sc 4inc 11sc 44 r12 15 4 rounds 44sc 44 insert eyes between r10 and r11 4 stitches apart ig demiwool head cont r16 11sc 4dec 6sc 4dec 11sc 36 r17 2sc decrease 2sc x 6 30 r18 3sc decrease x 6 24 r19 1sc decrease 1sc x 6 18 stuff the head firmly do not cut the yarn we will continue to crochet the body body r1 1sc increase 1sc x 6 24 r2 3sc increase x 6 30 r3 2sc increase 2sc x 6 36 r4 r6 3 rounds 36sc 36 ig demiwool body cont r7 5sc increase x 6 42 r8 r10 3 rounds 42sc 42 r11 5sc decrease x 6 36 r12 2sc decrease 2sc x 6 30 r13 3sc decrease x6 24 r14 1sc decrease 1sc x 6 18 r15 1sc decrease x 6 12 r16 6dec 6 stuff the body firmly cut the yarn close the remaining gap and weave in the end ig demiwool beak use orange yarn r1 magic_ring 6sc 6 r2 3 slip_stitch 3inc 9 fasten_off cut the yarn and leave a long tail for sewing sew the beak between r11 and r12 of the head between 2 eyes ig demiwool wings make 2 use yellow yarn r1 magic_ring 5sc 5 r2 5inc 10 r3 4sc increase x 2 12 r4 r5 2 rounds 12sc 12 r6 4sc decrease x 2 10 r7 5 decrease 5 fasten_off cut the yarn close the remaining gap and leave a long tail for sewing sew the wings on both side of the body between r2 and r3 of the body ig demiwool legs make 2 use orange yarn r1 magic_ring 5sc 5 r2 5inc 10 r3 10sc 10 r4 3sc decrease x 2 8 fold in half crochet 4sc through 2 edges fasten_off cut the yarn and leave a long tail for sewing sew the legs on both side at the bottom of the body ig demiwool tails use yellow yarn r1 magic_ring 5sc 5 r2 5inc 10 r3 10sc 10 fasten_off cut the yarn and leave a long tail for sewing sew the tail at the bottom back of the body tip flatten the tail horizontally when sewing ig demiwool ig
